parameters.name: ExplDirIndex
parameters.description: Explode direction manipulator index as defined in swExplodeDirectionIndex_e

title: IPartExplodeStep.GetExplodeDirection
description: Gets the explode direction (manipulator index and entity) for this explode step.

parameters.name: ExplDirIndex
parameters.description: Explode direction manipulator index as defined in swExplodeDirectionIndex_e

returns: Explode direction entity (e.g., IEdge , IFace2 , IRefAxis ); Nothing or null if an explode direction entity was not selected during creation of this explode step
